comments.body:
[~gmathews], the unusual thing in the above code is that same {{TableViewRow}} instance is being added multiple times to the {{TableView}} under different sections. That's likely the root cause. Probably a cloning issue.

I doubt this issue would happen if every section had its own row instances like how it's normally set up.
